http.html:
Skip to content

Main menu

  • Home
  • News
  • Contacts
  • Help
  • Feedback
  • Twitter
  • Facebook
  • YouTube
  • RSS

Welcome to NI Direct

Information and services

Motoring

MOT and vehicle testing, vehicle tax and registration, driver licensing, learner drivers, driving for a living, road safety

more on Motoring

Employment

Employment terms and conditions, redundancy, leaving your job, health and safety at work, workplace disputes and looking for work

more on Employment

Money, tax and benefits

Information on tax, benefits, welfare changes, pensions, money abroad, managing money and debt

more on Money, tax and benefits

Health and wellbeing

Advice on health conditions, a symptom search, healthy living, health services, having a baby, mental health and protecting the vulnerable

more on Health and wellbeing

Crime, justice and the law

Information on crime prevention, what to do if you're a victim or witness of crime, the justice system and going to court

more on Crime, justice and the law

Leisure, home and community

Family history, leisure and recreation, animal welfare and pets, noise nuisance, get online, safety in your home, moving abroad

more on Leisure, home and community

Pensions and retirement planning

Information and guidance about planning for retirement including forecasting your pension, how much income you will have and when to retire

more on Pensions and retirement planning

Property and housing

Information on buying, selling and renting property, paying rates, tenants' rights, housing and planning

more on Property and housing

Government, citizens and rights

Information on government, living in Northern Ireland, births, deaths, marriages, civil partnerships and consumer issues

more on Government, citizens and rights

Parents

Information for parents including your child's health and safety, education, child maintenance, childcare options, adoption and fostering

more on Parents

Travel, transport and roads

Public transport, air travel, parking, bus lanes and how to report problems with a road or street

more on Travel, transport and roads

People with disabilities

Information for people with disabilities on topics including employment, financial support, accessibility and rights

more on People with disabilities

Education, learning and skills

Information on education, training and improving your skills, as well as advice and support with subject and career choices

more on Education, learning and skills

Environment and greener living

Energy wise, waste and recycling, environmental quality in your area, greener homes and gardens

more on Environment and greener living

Caring for someone

Information and advice if you live in Northern Ireland and care for someone including your rights, support services and money issues

more on Caring for someone

Popular information

  • Universal Credit
  • AccessNI criminal record checks
  • Book, view, change or cancel an MOT/vehicle test appointment
  • A guide to rates
  • Holiday entitlements

Popular services

  • Book an MOT/vehicle test online
  • Change and rebook your MOT/vehicle test appointment online
  • Apply online for an enhanced check through a registered body
  • Book, change or cancel your theory test online
  • Log in to an nidirect account

Met Office weather

Featured

Flooding information

How to protect your home against flooding and what to do if a flood happens ... more

Welfare Changes Helpline

An independent helpline for anyone needing advice on changes to the welfare system ... more

 

Brexit

The UK is leaving the EU on 29 March 2019. Information about Brexit and how it might relate to NI or to people living in NI ... more
